alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clarendon; Orangeburg; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 10:57PM EDT until March 16 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Northern Clarendon County in central South Carolina... South central Sumter County in central South Carolina... Northeastern Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... * Until 1145 PM EDT. * At 1057 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Summerton, or 14 miles west of Manning, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Sumter, Manning, South Sumter, Summerton, Alcolu, Pinewood, Paxville, Rimini, St. Paul, Brogdon, Lakewood, Privateer, East Sumter and Davis Station. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 105 and 127. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
